## RushConstants.pinnedVersionsFilename property

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

> Warning: This API is now obsolete.
> 
> This feature has been superseded by the "preferredVersions" setting in common-versions.json
> 

The filename ("pinned-versions.json") for an old configuration file that that is no longer supported.

**Signature:**

```typescript
static readonly pinnedVersionsFilename: string;
```
